headline: A Deal To Build AI Data Centers In The Texas Desert Sent This Stock Soaring
summary: Texas Pacific Land stock jumped more than 8% after it struck a deal with the data center startup Bolt to build computing facilities meant to power the AI boom on its land.

headline: Is Texas Pacific Land’s (TPL) Data Center Pivot Quietly Redefining Its Royalty-Driven Business Model?
summary: Recently, Texas Pacific Land announced a three-for-one stock split effective December 22, 2025, while also revealing that major shareholder Horizon Kinetics purchased an additional share and that new analyst coverage began highlighting its extensive Texas land and royalty interests. A separate agreement with Bolt Data & Energy to develop large-scale data center campuses in West Texas marks a shift toward monetizing TPL’s land and infrastructure beyond traditional oil and gas royalties. We’ll...
